akas: Hollywood Heights - Törj a csúcsra! Hungary
Hollywood Heights - Vita da popstar Italy
akas from release info: Hollywood Heights - Törj a csúcsra! Hungary
Hollywood Heights - Vita da popstar Italy

1.title: Meeting a Rockstar
1.plot: Rockstar Eddie Duran and girlfriend Chloe return to hometown LA for the last concert of his tour. Super-fan Loren and her BFF Melissa are able to talk their way into the show just as he hits the stage.

2.title: Loren Catches Eddie's Attention
2.plot: During Eddie's performance, Loren is elated when his eyes meet hers. After the show, she sends him a lyric she wrote that catches his attention. Chloe sets Tyler straight.

3.title: Eddie's Songwriting Contest
3.plot: Tyler meets up with Eddie to Chloe's dismay, but the two just end up arguing about the past. Melissa tells Loren about Eddie's songwriting contest - this is her big chance!

4.title: Chloe's Secret
4.plot: When Loren hesitates, Melissa enters her song into the contest for her. Eddie comes dangerously close to uncovering a secret Chloe's hiding.

5.title: Eddie & Chloe Take the Next Step
5.plot: Loren is distressed about her song being entered into the contest, but Melissa and Nora cheer her up. Eddie decides he wants to take the next step with Chloe.

6.title: Loren Makes the Top 25
6.plot: Loren's song makes it to the contest's top 25. Chloe keeps an incriminating photo from the press. Kelly starts learning the business from Jake.

7.title: Loren Has to Make a Decision
7.plot: When Loren receives a scholarship, she decides to focus on a more realistic future. Eddie hints at marriage in an interview.

8.title: Max Questions Chloe
8.plot: Max begins to grow suspicious of Chloe, while Tyler hits hard times and gets an eviction notice. Phil helps Adriana cheat on a test.

9.title: Loren Doesn't Make the Cut
9.plot: Jake cuts Loren from the finalist list before sharing the songs with Eddie. Loren heads to the club opening with Melissa to give Eddie her song.

10.title: Eddie Questions His Feelings
10.plot: Loren and Melissa get into the club, but aren't able to give Eddie the song. Eddie sees a photo that may change his mind about Chloe.

11.title: Loren Gets Framed
11.plot: Chloe convinces Eddie that the incriminating photo is a fake. Adriana and Phil plant evidence in Loren's locker.

12.title: The Incriminating Photo
12.plot: Eddie plans a new surprise for Chloe. Loren is suspended from school unless she can prove her own innocence right away.

13.title: Loren's Proven Innocent
13.plot: Chloe tells Eddie that Tyler's been stalking her to explain the photo. Loren is proven innocent at school but doesn't make the contest's top five.

14.title: Chloe Finally Gets What She Wants
14.plot: After Loren's eliminated from the contest, Nora's boss Don helps her get the song to Max in an attempt at a second chance. Chloe finally gets what she wants.

15.title: Loren's Song
15.plot: Nora gets Max to listen to Loren's song. Max shares it with Eddie and Loren just may make it back into the contest!

16.title: Loren's Stage Fright
16.plot: Loren is added as a finalist in the competition, but learns she'll need to sing on stage. Eddie warns Tyler to stay away from Chloe.

17.title: Dinner at the Tate's
17.plot: Eddie wants to find someone for his dad, who mourns Katy's death on their anniversary. Nora invites Don and Adriana over for dinner.

18.title: The Announcement
18.plot: Eddie and Chloe make a big announcement. Loren nervously prepares for the contest event.

19.title: Loren Gets Lost
19.plot: As Eddie takes the stage to begin the contest, Loren and her friends are lost and stranded across town, trying desperately to make their way to the event.

20.title: The Songwriting Contest
20.plot: Just as Eddie is forced to move on with the contest without Loren, she finally finds her way to the club and takes the stage to perform. Chloe's shocked to come face to face with Jackie, a woman from her past.

21.title: A Winner Is Chosen
21.plot: With Eddie's help, Loren conquers her stage fright and is able to perform. Chloe hustles to hide Jackie from Eddie as the contest winner is announced.

22.title: The Music Video Rehearsal
22.plot: Loren arrives on set for Eddie's music video shoot. Phil proves his loyalty to Colorado, who rewards him with cash.

23.title: Chloe's Jealousy
23.plot: Chloe goes to great lengths to be a part of Eddie's music video and Tyler reveals the colossal secret he's holding over her head. Loren and Eddie grow closer practicing for the video shoot.

24.title: Max Confronts Chloe
24.plot: Max confronts Chloe about the dirt he's dug up on her past as he catches her coming from Tyler's apartment.

25.title: Lisa Reveals a Secret
25.plot: Loren contemplates her future. Jackie shows up and Chloe's forced to come clean about her past to Eddie. Lisa ï¬nally opens up to Melissa and reveals a big secret.

26.title: Loren's Dilemma
26.plot: After an unexpected meet-up with Eddie, Loren makes a huge decision about her future, a decision Nora ultimately supports. Max and Eddie clash regarding Chloe's lies.

27.title: Eddie & Chloe Meet Oz
27.plot: Eddie encourages Chloe to smooth things over with Jackie. Eddie and Chloe meet with big time movie producer Osborne Silver.

28.title: Melissa's Birthday
28.plot: Things escalate at Rumor between Jake, Max, Eddie and Tyler before Chloe creates a diversion. After Melissa's birthday celebration, Loren and Melissa have a run in with Phil and Adriana.

29.title: Chloe Turns Diva
29.plot: Chloe starts to show her true colors on the set of Eddie's music video shoot. Later, Loren's feeling more conï¬dent and invites Eddie to hang out.

30.title: Another Incriminating Photo
30.plot: Loren convinces Eddie to take a break from reality to help them celebrate Melissa's birthday. Later, Max shares with Eddie what he's uncovered about Chloe, which sparks all kinds of backlash.

31.title: Eddie Learns the Truth
31.plot: Chloe's incriminating photo may be the final straw for Eddie. Loren's on cloud 9 after another business meeting with Kelly.

32.title: The Video Shoot
32.plot: Eddie tries to put his personal issues aside while on set at the music video shoot and Loren gets promoted to a new part in the video.

33.title: Chloe Tries to Reconcile
33.plot: Eddie stonewalls Chloe when she shows up at his apartment, desperate to make amends. Phil gets deeper into trouble with Colorado.

34.title: The Collaboration
34.plot: Loren and Eddie work on her song and discover they make quite the team. Chloe does a televised interview with Lily.

35.title: The House Party
35.plot: Chloe tails Eddie to Loren's house party in the valley and is less than thrilled by what she sees - Eddie and Loren growing closer.

36.title: The Paparazzi Photo
36.plot: The paparazzi release a photo of Eddie and Loren at her house. Tyler's change of attitude throws off Chloe.

37.title: Eddie's New Song
37.plot: Tyler comforts Chloe after yet another rejection from Eddie. Eddie visits Loren at work.

38.title: Eddie's Birthday
38.plot: It's Eddie's birthday and he chooses to spend it songwriting with Loren. Nora's worried about Loren's developing feelings for Eddie.

39.title: The Double Date
39.plot: Loren convinces Nora to join Eddie and Max for Eddie's birthday dinner at Rumour. Gus and Lisa are more worried than ever about Phil.

40.title: Their Special Place
40.plot: After his birthday dinner, Eddie volunteers to drive Loren home but not before making a stop at a special place. Jackie makes a shocking discovery.

41.title: Eddie Inspires Loren
41.plot: Loren's absolutely elated and inspired after her night with Eddie, but Nora's concerned. It seems Chloe's latest ploy to get Eddie's attention may be working.

42.title: Eddie Explains Himself
42.plot: Tyler's getting fed up with Chloe after realizing the truth behind her hospital visit. Eddie opens up to Loren as they grow closer.

43.title: Loren's Recording Session
43.plot: Kelly arranges for Loren's first session in the recording studio. Osborne and Connor come up with a scheme to hook Eddie for their next big movie.

44.title: Eddie Feels at Home
44.plot: Eddie joins Nora and Loren for a home cooked meal. Adriana makes an unexpected discovery.

45.title: Chloe & Oz
45.plot: Chloe's determined to turn her life around and her meeting with Oz gets her off to a good start. Loren's overjoyed at the positive response her online video is receiving.

46.title: Jake's Concern
46.plot: Jake's worried that Eddie's new music is off base. Lily, Tyler and Jackie all try to warn Chloe of Oz's intentions, but she doesn't want to hear it.

47.title: Loren Deals with the Ex
47.plot: Eddie can't say no to Chloe's desperate plea for help, but Loren's unnerved when she learns the exes are spending time together.

48.title: Eddie Takes Off
48.plot: Eddie, in need of some alone time, takes off to Max's secluded beach bungalow. Colorado doesn't like being confronted by Detective Conlee and Gus, and puts the pressure on Phil.

49.title: The Beach Bungalow
49.plot: At the beach bungalow, Eddie opens up about his feelings for Loren. Max and Jake come down hard on Chloe for hurting Eddie.

50.title: Nora Visits Max
50.plot: Loren and Eddie enjoy their alone time at the bungalow, while Nora and Max get closer back in LA. Chloe is more determined than ever after finding out Tyler's tried to sabotage her.

51.title: Eddie's Inspired
51.plot: After returning from his getaway, Eddie begins to write more music. Melissa finally meets her Aunt Beth, but has no idea that back in LA, there's a family crisis.

52.title: Eddie Helps Chloe
52.plot: At Chloe's relentless begging, Eddie follows through on his promise to meet with Osborne Silver. Loren gets a makeover.

53.title: Loren's New Look
53.plot: Loren gets more comfortable in her new look as she models for a photo shoot. Eddie has agrees to star in Oz's next movie.

54.title: Loren's Debut
54.plot: Eddie and Loren prepare for their upcoming concert at MK Club. Tyler's more serious than ever about exposing Chloe. Melissa finally gets answers.

55.title: Eddie's New Sound
55.plot: Eddie's plays some of his new material for a friend. Max and Nora take their friendship to the next level.

56.title: Tyler Collects Evidence
56.plot: Everyone arrives for the concert at MK Club. Tyler goes snooping at Chloe's apartment for incriminating evidence.

57.title: If There Was No Music
57.plot: At the concert, Eddie surprises Loren by pulling her on stage to perform with him and then plays some of his new music. Lisa gets a visitor from her past.

58.title: Mixed Reactions
58.plot: Loren and Eddie get different reactions to their performances after the concert. Phil's raid of the clinic doesn't go as planned.

59.title: Tyler Blackmails Chloe
59.plot: Tyler makes a proposition to Chloe that if she moves back to Fresno he will shut Lily up. Elsewhere, Melissa tries to face things she's uncovered about her past when Beth sends a box full of stuff from New York. Eddie finds out about most of Kelly and Jake's issues and worries about Kelly changing Loren. Eddie picks up Loren and they have a talk about Kelly. Kelly reveals that Jake never wanted her to sign Loren. Eddie receives a mysterious call from Lily. Max and Nora have lunch at his club. Ellie continues to manipulate Don's mind. Phil and Adriana worry about their...

60.title: Loren Has Doubts
60.plot: Kelly convinces Loren, that their business relationship is fine. Eddie is disturbed by the mysterious call from Lily. Ellie continues to play blackmail with Don. Max and Nora grow closer. Mel decides that she wants her own place. Don makes a deal with Colorado, making Colorado upset with Phil. Phil hits a low point and goes to his parents and Detective Conlee to help him stay safe from Colorado. Don is suspicious Adriana might be pregnant. Lisa is lost with Beth, Mel, and Phil. Tyler forces Chloe to leave, but Chloe thinks otherwise, and ends her friendship with Lily....

61.title: The Mystery Texter
61.plot: Nora tells Loren the mystery texter is her father, and Loren is confused whether she should contact him or try to find more information about him. Ellie threatens Don to give her the money, so Don goes to Colorado to sell the drugs. Adriana is suspicious of him, and follows him. Mel is suspicious of Phil. Phil tries to save Adriana from getting into trouble. Chloe gets back at Tyler and finds out his hiding place of evidence. Eddie and Lily talk about things, and Eddie isn't sure whether he wants to keep finding out about his mother.

62.title: Loren Talks Business
62.plot: Loren is still having bad thoughts about her father. Eddie sets up a meeting with Lily, but she re-schedules it. Chloe and Tyler clash, but Chloe tells him that he'll never have evidence. Tyler records their entire conversation from his cell phone. Jake and Traci's marriage is going to a dead end. Phil finally manages to sabotage Colorado and get him arrested. Chloe plans to take down Loren. Eddie clashes with Kelly about Loren's career, but Loren isn't sure what she wants. Ellie continues to harass Nora, and she eventually quits. Don's need for money gets larger. ...

63.title: The Text Spoof
63.plot: Eddie and Kelly clash regarding the direction of Loren's career. Chloe puts a plan into action meant to bring Loren down, but it looks like the results may backfire.

64.title: Eddie Demands Answers
64.plot: Chloe points the finger at Tyler when Eddie demands answers. Max and Tyler make a horrifying discovery.

65.title: Missing
65.plot: Loren and Max are massively worried that Eddie is still missing. Tyler holds vigil at the hospital.

66.title: Bad News Travels Fast
66.plot: The news of Eddie's accident travels among those close to him. Lily interrogates Tyler about Chloe but he does his best to protect her innocence.

67.title: Max Looks for Answers
67.plot: Max is determined to get answers and won't stop looking until he learns the truth. Jake looks to Kelly for comfort.

68.title: Seeing a Ghost
68.plot: Mel runs interference when nosy classmates ask Loren for details on Eddie. Max is suspicious Tyler knows more than he's letting on.

69.title: Waking Up
69.plot: Loren's back in the recording studio, but she runs into some problems. Chloe makes progress.

70.title: A Strange Call
70.plot: Max is baffled by a call from a stranger delivering some mysterious news. Loren decides to have her first solo concert.

71.title: Max and Nora Go to Ojai
71.plot: Max and Nora search an Ojai gas station for clues. Tyler urges Chloe to tell the detective Eddie was responsible for her accident.

72.title: Loren and Kelly Clash
72.plot: Loren and Kelly disagree about Loren singing songs written by someone else. Don's plan for the clinic doesn't work out the way he hoped.

73.title: A Message from Loren
73.plot: Loren plans to play a new song for the first time at the memorial concert. Adriana is in denial about Don's accident.

74.title: Escape
74.plot: Loren does an interview from Eddie's apartment and Max receives a phone call with promising news. Phil defends his innocence.

75.title: Loren Learns the Truth
75.plot: Loren learns the truth about Eddie. Chloe tries to remember what happened the night of her fall.

76.title: Loren Confronts Chloe
76.plot: Loren tries to get Chloe to admit the truth about her accident. Max proposes a deal with Chloe. Eddie decides it's time to move on.

77.title: Jetsetter
77.plot: Kelly delivers some exciting news about Loren's upcoming gig. Eddie sneaks out to send Loren an anonymous message.

78.title: Fresno
78.plot: Max urges Loren to put her worry for Eddie aside and enjoy her big moment. Tyler and Chloe get an unexpected guest in Fresno.

79.title: An Unexpected Guest
79.plot: While Loren's getting ready for the concert, she comes face to face with someone from her past. Eddie confronts Chloe and Tyler.

80.title: The Final Concert
80.plot: Loren senses Eddie at her concert and makes a quick change to her set list. Eddie does his best to avoid being caught by the cops.

imdb.plot outline: Loren (Brittany Underwood) a smart, shy and independent high school senior who has ambitions of being a songwriter, secretly sends her song lyrics to her celebrity crush, rock superstar Eddie Duran (Cody Longo). Loren's wildest dreams come true when she not only wins a songwriting competition sponsored by Eddie, but strikes up a friendship with her idol. Eddie sees beyond Loren's potential as a songwriter and gives her a first break as a singer, and when the truth about his less-than-faithful girlfriend Chloe (Melissa Ordway) is revealed, Eddie and Loren's friendship blossoms.
imdb.title: Hollywood Heights
plot: Loren (Brittany Underwood) a smart, shy and independent high school senior who has ambitions of being a songwriter, secretly sends her song lyrics to her celebrity crush, rock superstar Eddie Duran (Cody Longo). Loren's wildest dreams come true when she not only wins a songwriting competition sponsored by Eddie, but strikes up a friendship with her idol. Eddie sees beyond Loren's potential as a songwriter and gives her a first break as a singer, and when the truth about his less-than-faithful girlfriend Chloe (Melissa Ordway) is revealed, Eddie and Loren's friendship blossoms.::Viacom
